sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: patch -Np1 -i ../kbd-&kbd-patch-version;.patch: This patch fixes two problems. The first one is the loadkeys -d behaviour, which is broken in current kbd versions. It is necessary to fix this, because the boot scripts rely on a proper loadkeys -d. The second part of the patch changes a Makefile so some utilities that are not installed by default (setlogcons, setvesablank and getunimap) are also installed.
